name: Fly Hands
description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey in this solo racing indie game, uniquely crafted with physics-based flying, exclusively in VR.
Navigate through checkpoints to reach the finish line, and here's the twist—pause the timer at any platform to savor the view and appreciate the scenery.

So, rev up those engines and let the adventure begin! Just make sure you're not afraid of heights!


Required: A SteamVR HMD and, HTC Controller or Valve Index Controller
